name: Pebble Pusher
description:
A simple(maybe too simple) game about pushing pebbles to the other side.

Controls: Click on hold on a home row(row closest to you) square to place a pebble there & drag and release in the direction you want to push it in(Can be straight ahead or in either forward diagonal)

This pushes the entire column or diagonal of pebbles forwards, UNLESS the diagonal or column has more pebbles of the opposing player's. 

Pebbles that are pushed off the sides into the water or into the other side are lost, while pebbles that are pushed back onto your side are retrieved(40 total pebbles per player)

Win by pushing 3 pebbles onto the opponents home row!

Multiplayer done with Photon

Was on my github for a year and a half before I decided to put it on here .-.
